entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
